message.body: Hi, how's it going? I got totally sunburned this weekend at the phillies game.
Did they at least win?
I spent the weekend house hunting
No, they lost 14-2. But I left in the sixth inning when it was 9-0.
Ouch
Yeah. So house hunting, huh?
I'd say half-hearted house hunting. Not sure yet if its gonna happen
Saw a great house on Sunday though, surrounded by parkland on 3 sides
Sounds nice. Looking to stay in the same area or move farther?
Def looking for the best of both worlds - country in the city. Can't stand the idea of a long commute
That seems hard to find, but I only know certain areas of the city, I guess
It's for sure hard to find and if you can find it you better be willing to pony up some serious $$$
The house we saw last weekend was pretty much perfect tho
Perfect is hard to resist. Do you think you'll go for it?
Not sure. We weren't planning to put our current house on the market so soon, and spouse is just about to start a new job.
And we don't know the neighborhood at all..,
Hmm, that complicates things.
I've been looking a little at houses, but not sure I want to make the leap
It's def a huge commitment ($ but also time) For me the upkeep is mich harder than the original purchase esp with an old house.
I love the look and feel of old houses, but I know the maintenance can be a real problem.
